name: Tilapia All-in-One Casserole
author: KATHYP100
summary: A quick, tasty tilapia casserole that is loved even by my husband who isn't crazy about fish.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen stir-fry vegetables, thawed
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Combine cooked rice, thawed vegetables, and Cheddar cheese in a large bowl
Melt butter in a small saucepan over low heat
Stir in lemon juice, bouillon granules, paprika, and pepper
Pour 1/2 of the butter sauce over the rice mixture
Stir to combine, then spread in the bottom of the prepared baking dish
Place tilapia fillets in a single layer on top of rice, and pour remaining sauce over top
Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 35 to 40 minutes
